title: Taxation office
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The workings of the Taxation Department, as explained to a young man joining the department. This film serves as an introduction to new Taxation Department staff, and gives the man in the street an insight as to how the Department functions.
creator_credit_for_label: John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
